item.title: Pennsylvania Department Of Education Touts ‘Media Literacy’ For Kids While Pushing Left-Wing Sources
item.description: PDE's efforts to help kids navigate various sources is weakened by ideological taint, but it is doomed by a rejection of absolute truth.

item.title: Wisconsin Public Schools Provide Sanctuary For Accused Groomers And Sex Abusers
item.description: A report finds, of the 461 teachers investigated for all forms of misconduct, 207 kept their licenses and were allowed to be around children.

item.title: The Left Would Rather Leave White House Lawn Buried In Rubble Than Allow Trump A Tangible Victory
item.description: It didn't take long for someone to go to court and attempt to seize control of the president's White House renovation project.

item.title: New York High Court Blocks Race-Grifters From Using Courts To Indoctrinate Children
item.description: Suing into existence a wide variety of political and policy preferences is a tried and true left-wing political tactic used in places where their poli...

item.title: Jay Jones’ ‘Community Service’ Scandal Is Worse Than You Think
item.description: It looks like much of Jay Jones’ court-mandated community service hours were spent advancing his and Democrats' political interests.
